summary: The customer called IC in regards to frequent disconnections during a call. The customer is concerned as they have a package that they need to send back to the company as their son experienced side effects after consuming the product. The customer is advised to register a complaint, and an agent will visit their home to collect the package. The customer is concerned that the product may not be handled properly and wants to know more about the manufacturing process. They are assured that the product will be tested and a new packet will be provided. The customer then proceeds to describe the unsanitary conditions of the factory and the lack of hygiene of the workers. They also mention that the product appears to be very watery. The customer insists on visiting the factory the next day as their daughter loves the product and they want to ensure its quality. The call ends with the customer waiting to provide additional information.
speaker_a_summary: The customer wants to know why a packet of a plant that they purchased kept dying. The customer support agent registers a complaint and assures the customer that an agent will visit their home to collect the packet for further investigation in Bangalore. They explain that the plant goes through quality tests multiple times before being distributed and if there is an issue, they will send a new packet to the customer's home. The customer is advised to stay on the line for two more minutes for the next agent.
speaker_b_summary: The caller is upset that their phone keeps getting disconnected during the call. They are discussing an issue with a package and wants to know the address of a plant in Bangalore, as they will collect the package themselves. The caller describes the state of the factory, mentioning poor hygiene and unsafe conditions. They are very adamant about collecting the package themselves as they have a 2-year-old daughter who had an adverse reaction to a product and they want to get to the bottom of it. They will go to any length to find out why their daughter is experiencing issues and is frustrated that the call keeps getting cut. The caller will arrive at the plant by 10 am.
cohere_points:
- User called IC in regards to frequent disconnections during a call
- Agent wants the user to provide patience so they can resolve the issue
- Issue could be due to network problems
- User wants to register a complaint about a product they purchased. 
- Agent wants to know the address where the product was purchased so they can send someone to collect it for further analysis.
Topic:
1. Phone Disconnecting Issue
2. Transferring Call to Agent
3. Network Problem
4. Complaint Registration Process
5. Packet Collection Procedure
6. Batch Number Tracking
7. Quality Testing Procedures
8. Side Effects Investigation
9. Product Return Policy
10. Quality Control Measures
11. Manufacturing Location
12. Packaging Inspection
13. Factory Visit Arrangements
14. Product Safety Standards
15. Customer Service Follow-up
Resolution: The customer's issue is not resolved as they are still expressing concerns and requesting further action to address the problem with the product.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy:
Yes.

The caller displayed empathy when they mentioned understanding the frustration of the customer with the disconnected phone calls and reassured them that the issue will be resolved by sending an agent to collect and test the packet before providing a new one.
